dict.string: export TM_RUBY= $(type -p "${TM_RUBY:-ruby}") -e' require "#{ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"]}/lib/tm/executor" require "#{ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"]}/lib/tm/save_current_document" TextMate.save_current_document TextMate::Executor.run(ENV["TM_PERL"] || "perl", "-I#{ENV["TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT"]}", "-Mexception_handler", ENV["TM_FILEPATH"], :version_args => ["-e", e_sh(%q{printf "Perl v%vd", $^V})])'<&0
